lyrics:
Heading to the woods tonight?
Keep those sasquatch out of sight!
Bigfoot Repellent, spray it round,
Ninety-seven percent - they won't be found!
Bigfoot Repellent - camp in peace!
*Results may vary, ask your local cryptid expert.
suno_prompt: folk bluegrass radio jingle, banjo and acoustic guitar, friendly outdoorsy male voice, camping product commercial, humorous tone, 18 seconds
notes: Camping product with asterisk disclaimer about effectiveness
